# The `TypeBasedAAResult` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A simple <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> result that uses TBAA metadata to answer queries. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::TypeBasedAAResult</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A simple <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> result that uses TBAA metadata to answer queries.

### shouldUseTBAA() {#a0b847d658ef34c458b6f4ae058cc047b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool TypeBasedAAResult::shouldUseTBAA () const">
Returns true if TBAA metadata should be used, that is if TBAA is enabled and type sanitizer is not used.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/typebasedaliasanalysis-h/#l00066">66</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/typebasedaliasanalysis-h">TypeBasedAliasAnalysis.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/typebasedaliasanalysis-cpp/#l00708">708</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/typebasedaliasanalysis-cpp">TypeBasedAliasAnalysis.cpp</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### UsingTypeSanitizer {#a220b678b4b4009d36d58c64f1ad9b3aa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::TypeBasedAAResult::UsingTypeSanitizer">
True if type sanitizer is enabled.

When TypeSanitizer is used, don&#39;t use TBAA information for alias analysis as this might cause us to remove memory accesses that we need to verify at runtime.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/typebasedaliasanalysis-h/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/typebasedaliasanalysis-h">TypeBasedAliasAnalysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
